Class Description
Accident
Bean representing Accident data.
AccountModification
Servlet implementation class AccountModification
AllTests  
Assignment
Bean representing assignment data.

Servlet implementation class AssignmentActive

Servlet implementation class AssignmentServlet
AssignmentStateResponse  
Authority
Extends User.
Citizen
Extends User.
CityHall
Bean representing city hall data.
ConnectionPool
this class manages the creation of the connections with the database, every connection gotten using GetConnection method must be released using Release Connection method.
Constants
This class contains the various constants used by safeStreets back end
DataAccessFacade
The DataAccessFacade as the name suggests is a facade which allows business logic to access the components which communicates with the database and gets, retrieves, updates and deletes data.
DatabaseNotFoundException
Extends Exception.
DataCollector
This class contains protected static methods which are used to retrieve data about reports and assignments.
Delete
Servlet implementation class Delete
District
Bean representing District data.
ForgotPassword
Servlet implementation class ForgotPassword
GenericResponse  
GetPhoto
Servlet implementation class GetPhoto
IllegalParameterException
Extends Exception.
Location
Class representing a couple of coordinates longitude and latitude
Login
Servlet implementation class Login
LoginResponse  
Logout
Servlet implementation class Logout
MailManager
Manages the email notification of the users.
ManageAccountModification
This interface defines the signatures of the methods to modify users and delete users
ManageAssignment
This interface defines the signatures of the methods to retrieve the assignments and to update assignment state
ManageAuthorityPosition
This interface defines the signatures of the methods to save and update an authority position
ManageDataAccess
This interface provides all the methods to retrieve, save, modify and delete data provided by the maldiniPaone.databaseConnection package
ManageLogin
This interface defines the signature of the method to Login
ManageNotification
This interface defines the signatures of the methods to notify authorities
Manager
Extends User.
ManageRegistration
This interface defines the signatures of the methods to manager registration
ManageRegistrationByManager  
ManageRegistrationByMunicipalities
This interface defines the signatures of the methods to manage registrations made by municipalities
ManageReportCreation
This interface defines the signature of the method to create reports
ManageStatistics
This interface defines the signatures of the methods to retrieve the statistics
ManageSuggestions
This interface defines the signatures of the methods to add and retrieve suggestions
ManageUserDataRetrieve
This interface defines the signatures of the methods to get useful informations about users
Municipality
Extends User.
NotificationManager
Implements ManageNotification Singleton design pattern
PasswordBuilder
This class contains a method to build a random password.
Photo
Bean representing a photo
PhotoManager
Manages the creation and retrieving of the photos
Registration
Servlet implementation class Registration
RegistrationByManager
Servlet implementation class RegistrationByManager
RegistrationByMunicipality
Servlet implementation class RegistrationByMunicipality
Report
Bean representing Report data.
ReportAndAssignmentDatabaseConnector
This class connects with the database using connections generated by ConnectionPool.
ReportAndAssignmentTests  
ReportAndAssignmentUpdater
This class contains protected static methods which are used to update data about reports and assignments.
ReportCreation  
ReportManager
Implements ManageReportCreation and ManageAssignment.
ServerSideDatabaseException
Extends Exception.
State
this enumeration contains the different possible states of assignments
Statistic
Bean representing statistics data.
StatisticBuilder
Builds statistics from data retrieve from DataAccessFacade
StatisticManager
Implements ManageStatistics Singleton design pattern
StatisticsResponse  
StatisticsServlet
Servlet implementation class StatisticsServlet
SuggestionManager
Implements ManageSuggestions Singleton design pattern
SuggestionResponse  
SuggestionServlet
Servlet implementation class SuggestionServlet
User
Abstract class representing the information which are in common for every kind of user
UserDatabaseConnector
This class connects with the database using connections generated by ConnectionPool.
UserDatabaseTests  
UserDataChecker
This class contains protected static methods which are used to get and update data about users.
UserFactory
This class contains static methods to build User
UserManager
Implements ManageAccountModification , ManageAuthorityPosition , ManageLogin , ManageRegistration, ManageRegistrationByMunicipalities ,ManageRegistrationByManager and ManageUserDataRetrieve.
UserType
this enumeration contains the different type of user that can interact with the system
Violation
Bean containing a violation type and the frequency of its occurrence
ViolationType
Enumeration representing the possible types of violation which the system can use to generate suggestions
